name: Cheese Soup - Yummy Food Fun
description:
Cold in winter? Why not get some hot cheese soup? Sounds Great? Yes, The hot cheese soup with potatoes and broccoli. Make as you like.

How to play:
- Use the knife to cut the onion into cubes first. Watch out, do not cut your fingers.
- Add some butter to fry the onion.
- Choose to make potato cheese soup or broccoli cheese soup.
- Add all the ingredients: milk,cheese,garlic to the pan and mix them well with the onions.
- Mix the cornstarch and the water together. Pour them to the pan.
- Let them cook together and slowly use your spoon to mix it.
- Wow, look at the food in the pan. It smells so good.
- Choose some desserts to go with your soup and decorate your soup with the pretty plates.
- Enjoy and share your perfect work!
- Have the crazy cooking fun in the cold winter.
